alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:37AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Callahan, Shackelford and Throckmorton Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 335 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Us-183 Near The Throckmorton- Baylor County Line to Us-283 Near The Callahan- Shackelford County Line. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Throckmorton around 345 AM CDT Albany around 400 AM CDT Moran around 415 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 302 and 310. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
